articles.title: VFX House DNEG Acquires Exclusive License to Ziva Technologies From Unity - Variety
articles.description: VFX house DNEG has acquired the exclusive license to Ziva from Unity.
articles.content:
Visual effects house DNEG has acquired the exclusive license to Ziva from Unity. The company will also onboard a significant proportion of the Ziva team.
The Ziva toolset powers the creation of digi… [+2028 chars]

articles.title: Don't Miss: Total Solar Eclipse, Mars and Saturn Rising, Slim Lunar Crescent, Comet 12P - SciTechDaily
articles.description: What are some skywatching highlights in April 2024? Catch Mars and Saturn rising, and Jupiter hangs out with Comet 12P. Plus NASA has you covered for the total eclipse whether you're headed to totality or watching from afar. https://youtu.be/vr0lysC2bNA Total…
articles.content: In April 2024, skywatchers can enjoy a total solar eclipse visible across the U.S., with Mars and Saturn rising together early in the month, and Jupiter and the crescent Moon pairing up on April 10. … [+5863 chars]

articles.description: In FY 2023-24, 76 Indian corporates raised Rs 61,915 crore through main board IPOs, marking a 19% increase from the Rs 52,116 crore raised by 37 IPOs in 2022-23

articles.title: Rumoured smartphone launches in April 2024: Realme GT 5 Pro, Samsung Galaxy M55 and more - HT Tech
articles.description: As April unfolds, anticipation surges among Indian tech enthusiasts as major smartphone brands gear up to unveil their latest offerings. From Motorola's flagship Edge 50 Pro to Samsung's mid-range contender, the Galaxy M55, know what's launching soon.
